component.name: Vaani
component.summary: Beautiful, Fast and Functional Audiobook Player for your Audiobookshelf server

description.p: Vaani is a client for your (self-hosted) Audiobookshelf server.

ul.li: Functional Player: Speed Control, Sleep Timer, Shake to Control Player
Save data with Offline listening and caching
Extensive Settings to customize every tiny detail

description.p: Note: you need an Audiobookshelf server setup for this app to work. Please see https://www.audiobookshelf.org/ on how to setup one if not already.
